modShortDescription: Creates a recipe for crafting 10 Bottles of Acid from 10 rotting flesh, 25 bones, 10 murky water, and one Bottle of Acid.
modDescription:
Creates a recipe for crafting 10 Bottles of Acid from 10 rotting flesh, 25 bones, 10 murky water, and one Bottle of Acid.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-ShoudensModlets/tree/master/7DTD-Acid)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25892-shoudens-misc-modlets-a20/).
